Uses of Class
org.jamwiki.WikiMessage

  • Packages that use WikiMessage 
    Package Description
    org.jamwiki
    The org.jamwiki package contains the core interfaces and classes needed for JAMWiki to function.
    org.jamwiki.db
    Provides classes needed for all database interaction.
    org.jamwiki.model
    Provides basic objects for use on the Wiki, including WikiUser, Topic, TopicVersion, etc.
    org.jamwiki.servlets
    Provides classes that work with the Spring Framework to process HTTP requests and to then redirect appropriately.
    org.jamwiki.utils
    Provides various general utility classes including encryption, caching, and logging.

    • Uses of WikiMessage in org.jamwiki

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Return the WikiMessage object associated with this exception.

      Constructor for a WikiException containing a Wiki message value.

    • Uses of WikiMessage in org.jamwiki.model

      Methods in org.jamwiki.model that return WikiMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WikiMessage RecentChange.getChangeWikiMessage()
      This field is a generated field used to return a WikiMessage object that represents any auto-generated message information for the recent change entry, such as "Topic A renamed to Topic B" when renaming a topic.
      WikiMessage LogItem.getLogWikiMessage()
      Utility method for displaying a formatted log message specific to the log type and params.
      static WikiMessage LogItem.retrieveLogWikiMessage(String virtualWiki, int logType, Integer logSubType, String logParamString, Integer topicVersionId) 
      Methods in org.jamwiki.model with parameters of type WikiMessage 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RecentChange.setChangeWikiMessage(WikiMessage changeWikiMessage)
      This field is a generated field used to return a WikiMessage object that represents any auto-generated message information for the recent change entry, such as "Topic A renamed to Topic B" when renaming a topic.
